customer_query.query: SELECT c.CustomerID, c.FirstName, c.LastName, c.Email, c.PhoneNumber, c.JoinDate, c.Status, c.LoyaltyPoints, a.AddressID, a.Street, a.City, a.State, a.PostalCode, a.Country FROM pipeline.[source].Customers AS c INNER JOIN pipeline.[source].Customer_Addresses AS a ON c.CustomerID = a.CustomerID
customer_query.description: Query to fetch customer data with their addresses

order_items_query.query: SELECT oi.OrderItemID, oi.OrderID, oi.ProductName, oi.Quantity, oi.PricePerItem, co.CustomerID, co.OrderDate, co.OrderStatus, co.TotalAmount, cp.PaymentID, cp.PaymentDate, cp.PaymentAmount, cp.PaymentMethod FROM pipeline.[source].Order_Items oi INNER JOIN pipeline.[source].Customer_Orders co ON oi.OrderID = co.OrderID INNER JOIN pipeline.[source].Customer_Payments cp ON oi.OrderID = cp.OrderID
order_items_query.description: Query to fetch order items data with related order and payment information

customer_tickets_query.query: SELECT cst.TicketID, cst.CustomerID, cst.IssueType, cst.Description, cst.TicketDate, cst.ResolutionStatus, c.FirstName, c.LastName, c.Email, c.PhoneNumber, c.JoinDate, c.Status, c.LoyaltyPoints FROM pipeline.[source].Customer_Support_Tickets cst INNER JOIN pipeline.[source].Customers c ON cst.CustomerID = c.CustomerID
customer_tickets_query.description: Query to fetch customer support tickets with related customer information
